title: Clarins Super Restorative Night Cream Very Dry Skin 50ml
description:
New innovation for menopausal skin.

The Super Restorative range is ideal for all women experiencing the effects of hormonal changes associated with menopause and has been formulated to support the skin during this stage of a woman's life. The skin is a hormone dependent organ and the changes in hormones during peri and the start of post-menopause result in the skin becoming unbalanced. This disruption means that the skin struggles to protect itself during the day as well as reactivate itself at night. This can result in signs of ageing becoming more visible. The nourishing and revitalising formulas of Super Restorative help to fight visible changes on the skin which include dryness, skin slackening, loss of density, deep-set wrinkles, and an uneven skin tone. 

New research has led to Clarins’ discovery of organic harungana which has intensive replenishment and anti-ageing benefits and offers the same effect as retinol whilst being tolerated by all skin types. Organic harungana is combined with our new plant discovery, organic gorse extract, which helps improve the tone of fibroblasts by up to 89% and provides a firmer, more toned skin alongside other ingredients such as organic desert date extract, organic sea lily and vitamin C derivative. 

Each of the Super Restorative Day & Night creams are formulated to adapt to the skin’s chronobiology. During the day, the skin is vulnerable and needs protection and the squalane extract found in our day formulas reinforces the hydrolipidic film and protects the skin. At night, the skin needs reactivating as microcirculation slows. Organic service tree bud extract helps to stimulate the skins microcirculation and boosts radiance. This innovative day and night duo ensure the skins specific needs are met around the clock.

The Night Cream for Very Dry Skin boosts the skin’s radiance thanks to the service tree bud extract. It is perfect for everyone whose skin needs extra nourishment.



Suitable for

All skin types



How to use

Apply in the morning to clean, dry skin. Warm the cream in the hands then place them over the face, working from the middle outward over the face and neck. Apply by gently pressing into the skin, always from the middle of the face outwards to avoid pulling tissues, enhance drainage and preserve features’ youthful appearance.
ai_title: Clarins Super Restorative Night Cream - 50ml
ai_summary:
Give your skin the nourishment it craves with Clarins Super Restorative Night Cream, a luxurious formula designed to revitalise mature skin. This rich cream targets the visible signs of ageing associated with hormonal changes, leaving your skin feeling smoother and more radiant. Perfect for those seeking a powerful anti-ageing solution.
  • Intensive Replenishment: Combats dryness and loss of density.
  • Improved Skin Tone: Helps firm and tone skin with organic gorse extract.
  • Reduced Wrinkles: Targets deep-set wrinkles and uneven skin tone.
  • Chronobiology-Adapting Formula: Works with your skin's natural rhythms for optimal results.
  • Suitable for Very Dry Skin: Provides extra nourishment and radiance.

title: Cl-ear Olive Oil Ear Spray 20ml
description:
Easy to use spray, now in a bigger value pack. Gently softens & removes ear wax. Reduces the need for syringing. With medical grade olive oil. 
Ear wax is a natural, oily substance produced to protect the eardrum. In some people this wax can build up which can lead to ear pain or partial hearing loss. Olive oil is a natural lubricant which gently softens and helps remove ear wax. Olive Oil can be used during pregnancy and whilst breastfeeding.

Suitable for

Suitable for children 12+, adults and the elderly. Children under the age of 12 should receive medical diagnosis before use. 


How to use

• Check that the nozzle and bottle are not damaged or broken before use. • Before using a new bottle of olive oil, shake well, then press the actuator down 3 to 4 times until you get a spray. This will prime the system for first use. • Tilt head to one side with the affected ear facing upwards. • Holding the bottle in an upright position with the nozzle placed in the ear canal, depress the actuator fully 1 or 2 times. • Gently massage around the outside of the ear. • Plug the ear lightly with cotton wool if required to prevent leakage. • To remove oil, tilt head so that ear is facing downwards and allow oil to drain. Gently wipe outside of ear to remove residue. • Gently wipe nozzle with clean cotton wool after use.
• Use the spray twice a day for up to 5 days.
• Repeat with other ear if required.
• The doctor, nurse, or specialist may advise you with specific instructions for using the spay depending on the severity of the wax problem. You should follow the instructions to ensure removal of wax.


Hazards and Cautions

Children under the age of 12 years should receive medical diagnosis before using this spray to confirm earwax is present. Consult your doctor or pharmacist if you are using any other medication in your ears. Do not use if the ear is infected, inflamed or bleeding or if the eardrum is ruptured. There are no known side effects when using olive oil but if you experience any irritation or any other effects stop using them and tell your doctor or pharmacist. Avoid contact with the eyes, in case of accidental contact, rinse thoroughly with clean water and consult a doctor. If symptoms persist, consult your doctor. Keep out of the sight and reach of children. For external use only.
Storage  Store between 10˚C - 25˚C. Do not use after the expiry date printed on the carton and label. Use within 28 days of first opening otherwise discard the contents.

Ingredients

title: Clinique Clarifying Do-Over Peel 30ml
description:
With a special 32% Micro-Acid+ Complex, reveals fresher surface cells for skin that looks radiant and renewed.

Skin Types: Dry Combination to Oily Skin Key Ingredients: 7-acid blend of AHAs/BHA/PHA, algae extract, yeast extract Benefits: Smooths and renews the look of skin

What It Does: · This at-home peel helps to reveal fresher surface cells with each use, and is gentle enough to leave on. · With a special 32% Micro-Acid+ Complex, this potent formula works from multiple angles to help support skin’s turnover process through exfoliation, supporting skin’s natural renewal and helping to remove dead skin cells that build up on the surface.
· In addition to removing dead skin cells, it also removes dirt and oil-all of which can clog pores and lead to breakouts.
· Skin looks smoother and more radiant and feels softer.
· It’s the perfect complement to our twice-daily exfoliator, Clarifying Lotion. For powerful exfoliation, use Clarifying Do-Over Peel 2-3 nights a week and then on other nights and every morning, use Clarifying Lotion.


Key Ingredients: An exclusive 32% Micro-Acid+ Complex features:
• 7-acid blend of AHAs/BHA/PHA: Helps to remove dead skin cells that build up on skin’s surface and make skin appear dull. The blend includes glycolic acid, lactic acid, citric acid, tartaric acid, pyruvic acid-all alpha hydroxy acids; salicylic acid, a beta hydroxy acid; and lactobionic acid, a poly hydroxy acid.
· Algae and yeast extracts: Help support skin’s natural renewal for fresh, smoother-looking skin.


Formula Facts: · Fragrance free.
· Allergy tested.


Free Of:
Info pending regulatory/R&D review, as well as legal sustainability approval (route through the free-of process).



How to use

• 2-3 nights a week, saturate a cotton pad and sweep over clean skin. No need to rinse. • Follow with serum and moisturizer.  • If you use Clarifying Lotion, skip it the nights you use Clarifying Do-Over Peel. • Use as directed. If irritation occurs, limit frequency of use and if it persists, discontinue use and consult a physician. Avoid eye area. Use sunscreen and limit sun exposure while using and the week after.

title: Clearblue Digital Ultra Early Pregnancy Test, 2 Digital Tests
description:
Clearblue Digital Ultra Early Pregnancy Test, 2 Digital Tests

Clearblue Digital Ultra Early Pregnancy Test kit combines ultra-sensitive early detection of the pregnancy hormone with ultra clear digital results in words. Our most sensitive digital pregnancy test can be used up to six days before your missed period. *78% of pregnant results can be detected 6 days before your missed period (which is 5 days before you expect your period).

Test sensitivity is 10mIU/ml. Testing is made easy by an extra wide tip and our unique stop light feature, which flashes to tell you when you have sampled enough urine. Plus our Floodguard Technology helps to dramatically reduce reported user error (data on file).

Once the test is running, the Smart Countdown will appear on screen to reassure you the test is progressing, counting down to your clear digital result in words, which will appear on screen within 1-5 minutes. Like all Clearblue Pregnancy Tests, Digital Ultra Early is over 99% accurate at detecting pregnancy when used from the day you expect your period. 

For more information visit our website:

title: Clinique Moisture Surge™ SPF 25 Sheer Hydrator 30ml
description:
Clinique Moisture Surge™ SPF 25 Sheer Hydrator 30ml

Light creamy moisturiser with SPF 25 delivers the hydration you love from Moisture Surge™, plus sheer sun protection without a white cast – even for deep skin tones. Safe for sensitive skin and oil-free, it's perfect for daily wear creating a smooth canvas for makeup. 

Skin Types: Very Dry to Dry, Dry Combination, Combination Oily, Oily.

What It Does · This hydrating SPF moisturiser has a light cream texture with aloe vera bio-ferment + hyaluronic acid complex and pro-vitamin D that sinks into skin for deep, all-day hydration. · Protects against UVA/UVB rays to help keep the sun’s glow from dulling yours. UV exposure can exacerbate existing dark spots and trigger new ones, speed up signs of ageing, interfere with skin’s natural turnover for more noticeable pores, and lead to irritation, which can leave skin looking tired. · Looks opaque going on, blends in sheer. Without a white cast, residue, or stickiness. · Leaves skin feeling hydrated, looking plumped and glowing—not shiny. · Provides a smooth canvas for makeup application.  · Safe for sensitive skin.



How to use

· The formula looks opaque going on, so you can see where you apply it. · Start in the centre, applying at the highest points, where the sun hits first. · Pat or massage outward, covering your entire face. Pat or massage in until fully sheer.



Important info

Formula Facts: · Oil-free. · Non-comedogenic - doesn’t clog pores.· Non-greasy.
· Fragrance free.
· Dermatologist tested.
· Alcohol-free



Active ingredients

· Hyaluronic acid: This moisture-binding ingredient helps attract moisture to create a “moisture reservoir” for ideal hydration. Clinique's formula is expertly blended with two different molecular weights of hyaluronic acid. · Aloe vera bio-ferment: Clinique scientists transformed the aloe vera plant through an exclusive fermentation process. One of the benefits of fermentation is that it breaks apart larger molecules into smaller ones, making them more easily absorbed into skin. Made with lactobacillus, activated aloe water, and responsibly sourced and certified organic aloe vera extract powder, this nutrient-rich ingredient helps skin retain moisture. · Pro-vitamin D: Helps provide environmental protection.

Clarifying Lotion is Step 2 in Clinique’s 3-Step skincare system. Cleanse with Facial Soap, Exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion, moisturize with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, oil-free Gel, lightweight Jelly, or rich Cream.

Did you know Clinique’s exfoliating lotion is different from a toner?

Toners are primarily used to help rebalance skin after cleansing. Clinique Clarifying Lotion is formulated with exfoliating ingredients to help remove dead cells on skin’s surface. Clearing away that debris helps allow your skincare to work better. After using Clarifying Lotion, your skin can more readily absorb moisturiser and other treatment products.

  • Salicylic acid

  • Witch hazel - Helps refine skin.

  • Acetyl glucosamine - Helps balance and smooth skin.


Skin-Typed Formulas

  • Clarifying Lotion 1.0: Extra-gentle, alcohol-free formula is safe for sensitive skin.

  • Clarifying Lotion 1: Mild for very dry skin.

  • Clarifying Lotion 2: Gentle for dry combination skin.

  • Clarifying Lotion 3: Great for combination oily skin.

  • Clarifying Lotion 4: Formulated for oily skin.

title: Clinique Moisture Surge™ 100H Auto-Replenishing Hydrator 50ml
description:
Clinique Moisture Surge™ 100H Auto-Replenishing Hydrator 50ml​

Refreshing oil-free gel-cream with hyaluronic acid and aloe bio-ferment deeply hydrates for skin that looks plump and glowing.​  

​What It Is​: An oil-free gel-cream moisturiser with hyaluronic acid and aloe bio-ferment that sinks into skin for deep, lasting hydration. ​

​99% of women said skin feels deeply hydrated.*​

*Consumer testing on 110 women after one week​  

​What It Does​: This lightweight oil-free formula provides deeply moisturising hydration.​

Advanced hydrator with Auto-Replenishing Technology that helps skin create its own internal water source to continually rehydrate itself, then locks in moisture for a plump, healthy-looking glow.​

Safe for sensitive skin.​

​High-Performance Results:​

99% of women said skin feels deeply hydrated.*​

95% of women said skin looks plump.*​

91% of women said skin looks glowing.*​

98% of women said skin feels more resilient.*​

95% of women said skin feels healthier.*​

*Consumer testing on 110 women after one week​  

​Key Ingredients:​ Hyaluronic Acid + Aloe Bioferment combines two hydrating ingredients into one powerhouse complex to help attract moisture and retain it.​

Hyaluronic Acid: This moisture-binding ingredient helps create a “moisture reservoir” for ideal hydration.​

Aloe Bioferment: The aloe vera plant undergoes an exclusive fermentation process that breaks apart larger molecules into smaller ones, making them more easily absorbed into skin. Activated aloe water, and responsibly sourced and certified organic aloe extract powder, helps skin retain moisture. ​

Good to know:​ Now in more sustainable packaging. 30ml, 50ml, and 75ml are packed in recyclable glass jars and uses PCR plastic lids.​

What is PCR? PCR stands for “Post-Consumer Recycled.” PCR plastic is recycled plastic and enables us to reduce the creation of new plastic waste.​

How to recycle: The glass jars are recyclable. Remove the cap, then rinse the jar and place in the relevant recycling bin.​



Suitable for

All skin types​



How to use

Use morning and night on clean skin ​ This favourite multi-tasker can also be used as a dewy highlighter, 5-minute mask and cuticle treatment.​



Important info

title: Clear & Simple Pregnancy Test Strip - 3 Tests
description:
The device is a self-test immunoassay designed for the qualitative determination of human chorionic gonadotropin (HCG) in urine for early detection of pregnancy.



How to use

Collect a urine sample in a clean dry container. Open the sealed pouch and remove the strip. Put the test strip vertically into the urine sample making sure that the arrows are pointing down. Do not allow the urine level to go above the max line marked on the strip. Leave the test strip in the urine sample for 10 seconds.
Take the strip out, lay it flat and read the result within 5 minutes. For the first few seconds after wetting you should see the liquid moving up the test area causing it to go light purple. As the purple fades the control line will appear as a strong line and the test line if present will appear below this.



Hazards and Cautions

1. For in vitro diagnostic use only (NOT for internal use). 2. Do not use beyond the expiry date marked on the foil pouch. 3. Each Pregnancy Test Stick can only be used once; do not re-use the Pregnancy Test Stick. 4. Do not use the Pregnancy Test Stick if the foil pouch is damaged. 5. Once the foil pouch has been opened, the Pregnancy Test Stick should be used straight away 6. The silica gel sachet (desiccant) may be a choking hazard for children and small pets. 7. Ensure that you dispose of this with your normal household waste straight after use. 8. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN.
9. Do not freeze.



Ingredients

Membrane, Absorbent paper, Colloidal Gold, PVC Board

description:
Even Better Clinical Radical Dark Spot Corrector + Interruptor 30mlOur most powerful brightening serum helps minimize the appearance of discoloration and blemish marks, while interrupting the look of future dark spots. Now with double the dose, this formula features our proprietary brightening molecule for a more even skin tone plus helps minimize the look of blemish marks. Interrupts the look of future dark spots, too.Our “damage eraser” with patented CL302 Equalizer Technology is now more concentrated, with boosted technology to deliver dramatic brightening results—yet is still gentle enough for all skin types. How To UseUse twice a day, morning and night.
1. Dispense 1 to 2 pumps onto fingertips.
2. Spread serum all over your face, avoiding eye area.
3. Follow with moisturizer.
4. Daily sunscreen is imperative. Apply in the A.M. after your moisturizer.

Key Ingredients/ Technology:
CL302 Equalizer Technology targets dark spots in two ways: corrects with the CL302 Complex and interrupts future ones with the Interrupter Complex.

CL302 Complex: with 2X the brightening dose helps visibly reduce dark spots and discoloration. It includes the following:
•UP302 (dimethoxytolyl propylresorcinol): A targeted brightening molecule inspired by border silver, or dianella ensifolia, a botanical known in traditional Chinese medicine for its antioxidant properties.
•Ascorbyl glucoside: Helps reduce the appearance of discoloration.
•Glucosamine: Weakens the bonds that hold dead skin cells together to encourage the departure of cells containing melanin.
•Yeast extract: Clinique’s “cluster buster” breaks up (exfoliates) large clusters of pigment into smaller particles so they’re less visible.
•Salicylic acid: Gently sloughs off the uppermost layers of the skin to reveal fresher, more even tone skin.

Interrupter Complex: with a cocktail of soothing ingredients helps minimize irritation to interrupt future hyperpigmentation. It includes the following:
•Gyokuro (camellia sinensis leaf) extract: A green tea harvested with a special method in Japan that helps quell irritation.
•Mulberry root extract: Rich in antioxidants that help counter free-radical damage that causes irritation.
•Rice bran extract: A potent anti-oxidant and anti-irritant, and helps to prevent future dark spots by defending skin against damaging free radicals.
•Complex of olive squalene, barley extract, and wheat germ extract: Helps nourish and replenish skin with hydration.
•Dipotassium glycyrrizate (licorice extract): Acts as an anti-irritant that reduces the negative visible effects of stress and pollution

title: Clearblue Digital Ultra Early Pregnancy Test, 1 Digital Test
description:
Clearblue Digital Ultra Early Pregnancy Test, 1 Digital Test

Clearblue Digital Ultra Early Pregnancy Test kit combines ultra-sensitive early detection of the pregnancy hormone with ultra clear digital results in words.

Our most sensitive digital pregnancy test can be used up to six days before your missed period. *75% of pregnant results can be detected 6 days before your missed period (which is 5 days before you expect your period). Test sensitivity is 10mIU/ml.

Testing is made easy by an extra wide tip and our unique stop light feature, which flashes to tell you when you have sampled enough urine. Plus our Floodguard Technology helps to dramatically reduce reported user error (data on file).

Once the test is running, the Smart Countdown will appear on screen to reassure you the test is progressing, counting down to your clear digital result in words, which will appear on screen within 1-5 minutes.

Like all Clearblue Pregnancy Tests, Digital Ultra Early is over 99% accurate at detecting pregnancy when used from the day you expect your period. 

For more information visit our website:

•No brand is more accurate: over 99% accurate from the day you expect your period •Ultra sensitive detection of hCG (10mIU/ml) •Ultra early results 6 days before your missed period* •Ultra clear results in words for more trust in your early result – no faint lines •No.1 brand most recommended in a survey of doctors in the UK (data on file) •Ultra easy to use – with unique stop light, wide tip, FloodguardTM Technology, Smart Countdown to result



Hazards and Cautions

Please read the enclosed leaflet before use.

For self-testing at home. For in vitro diagnostic use only. Do not reuse.

Keep out of reach of children.

Store between 2°- 30°C.

title: Clearblue Digital Ovulation Test Kit - 10 tests
description:
Clearblue Digital Ovulation Test Kit (OPK) Of 10 TestsThis easy to read Clearblue Digital Ovulation Test accurately pinpoints your 2 most fertile days each cycle, so you can maximise your chances of getting pregnant naturally. There are only a few days each cycle when a woman can conceive, the days leading up to and including the day of ovulation. But cycles are variable and so is the timing of ovulation, which means that 1 in 2 women could be trying to conceive at the wrong time of the cycle1. These simple urine tests are over 99% accurate at detecting the rise in a key fertility hormone (luteinising hormone) 24-36 hours before ovulation. A clear smiley face appears in the digital display when your LH surge has been detected, so you know this day and the following day are your best 2 days to try for a baby. For women whose cycles are variable, it can be especially challenging to accurately detect the timing of the 2 best days to get pregnant. A 20ct test kit will give you a higher chance of detecting your most fertile days. 1Johnson SR., et al. Hum. Repro. (2011) 26: i236.   • 10 Clearblue Digital Ovulation Test sticks included



How to use

Read complete instructions before use. Before applying urine to the test stick it must be inserted into the test holder.



Hazards and Cautions

Clearblue Digital Ovulation Test is not intended for contraceptive use and is not suitable if you have recently been pregnant, reached the menopause, have polycystic ovarian syndrome or are taking certain fertility drugs. Clearblue Digital Ovulation Test can be used if you are taking clomiphene citrate. Please read the enclosed leaflet carefully. This device is for home use. Keep out of the reach of children. Store at room temperature. Do not reuse the test sticks. Clearblue is a trade mark of SPD Swiss Precision Diagnostics GmbH (‘SPD’). Copyright © 2017 SPD. All rights reserved.

98% said their tight, dry skin felt relieved.

Oil, sulfates, denatured alcohol, synthetic colors.

title: Clarins Super Restorative Day Cream Very Dry Skin 50ml
description:
New innovation for menopausal skin.

The Super Restorative range is ideal for all women experiencing the effects of hormonal changes associated with menopause and has been formulated to support the skin during this stage of a woman's life. The skin is a hormone dependent organ and the changes in hormones during peri and the start of post-menopause result in the skin becoming unbalanced. This disruption means that the skin struggles to protect itself during the day as well as reactivate itself at night. This can result in signs of ageing becoming more visible. The nourishing and revitalising formulas of Super Restorative help to fight visible changes on the skin which include dryness, skin slackening, loss of density, deep-set wrinkles, and an uneven skin tone. 

New research has led to Clarins’ discovery of organic harungana which has intensive replenishment and anti-ageing benefits and offers the same effect as retinol whilst being tolerated by all skin types. Organic harungana is combined with our new plant discovery, organic gorse extract, which helps improve the tone of fibroblasts by up to 89% and provides a firmer, more toned skin alongside other ingredients such as organic desert date extract, organic sea lily and vitamin C derivative. 

Each of the Super Restorative Day & Night creams are formulated to adapt to the skin’s chronobiology. During the day, the skin is vulnerable and needs protection and the squalane extract found in our day formulas reinforces the hydrolipidic film and protects the skin. At night, the skin needs reactivating as microcirculation slows. Organic service tree bud extract helps to stimulate the skins microcirculation and boosts radiance. This innovative day and night duo ensure the skins specific needs are met around the clock.

The Day Cream for Very Dry Skin protects the skin from pollutants due to its anti-pollution complex, protects the skin’s natural barrier with vegetal squalene and instantly smooths the skin thanks to line filing pearls. It is perfect for everyone whose skin needs extra nourishment.



Suitable for

All skin types



How to use

Apply in the morning to clean, dry skin. Warm the cream in the hands then place them over the face, working from the middle outward over the face and neck. Apply by gently pressing into the skin, always from the middle of the face outwards to avoid pulling tissues, enhance drainage and preserve features’ youthful appearance.
ai_title: Clarins Super Restorative Day Cream - Very Dry Skin, 50ml
ai_summary:
Revitalize your skin with Clarins Super Restorative Day Cream, a luxurious formula designed to address the specific needs of menopausal skin. This nourishing cream combats dryness, loss of density, and wrinkles, leaving your skin feeling firmer and more toned. Perfect for those seeking an anti-aging solution.

  • Intensive Replenishment: Formulated with organic harungana for powerful anti-aging benefits.
  • Enhanced Skin Tone: Contains organic gorse extract to improve fibroblast tone and firmness.

  • Rich Nourishment: Ideal for very dry skin needing extra care and hydration.

description:
Calling all Super Restorative Total Eye Concentrate lovers - we have a new and improved formula, with the same texture, you're going to adore! Our key active ingredients:  Clarins uses over 250 natural plant extracts in its formulas. All those active ingredients are carefully selected for their effectiveness and are delivered in an optimal formula to reveal the beauty of every woman. 

Firming eye cream Rejuvenate and revive tired-looking eyes with an eye cream or an anti-fatigue eye gel from Clarins. Whether you want to stop the early signs of aging, or tackle existing puffiness, loss of density, and fine lines, we’ve got an eye firming cream to help. 


About Clarins : From the beginnings as a Parisian spa, Clarins has remained one of the biggest names in beauty for over 60 years. Thanks to our iconic product collection, brimming with pure plant extracts and essential oils, our products are both efficacious and luxurious.

Clarins We Care :  At the core of Clarins is a love of people and the planet. We believe that beauty comes from the heart and is expressed by taking action.

Press gently with finger tips working outwards under the eye to temples and then gently press outwards over the eye lids to temples and then press between the brows.

title: Clarins Super Restorative Night Cream All Skin Types 50ml
description:
New innovation for menopausal skin.

The Super Restorative range is ideal for all women experiencing the effects of hormonal changes associated with menopause and has been formulated to support the skin during this stage of a woman's life. The skin is a hormone dependent organ and the changes in hormones during peri and the start of post-menopause result in the skin becoming unbalanced. This disruption means that the skin struggles to protect itself during the day as well as reactivate itself at night. This can result in signs of ageing becoming more visible. The nourishing and revitalising formulas of Super Restorative help to fight visible changes on the skin which include dryness, skin slackening, loss of density, deep-set wrinkles, and an uneven skin tone. 

New research has led to Clarins’ discovery of organic harungana which has intensive replenishment and anti-ageing benefits and offers the same effect as retinol whilst being tolerated by all skin types. Organic harungana is combined with our new plant discovery, organic gorse extract, which helps improve the tone of fibroblasts by up to 89% and provides a firmer, more toned skin alongside other ingredients such as organic desert date extract, organic sea lily and vitamin C derivative. 

Each of the Super Restorative Day & Night creams are formulated to adapt to the skin’s chronobiology. During the day, the skin is vulnerable and needs protection and the squalane extract found in our day formulas reinforces the hydrolipidic film and protects the skin. At night, the skin needs reactivating as microcirculation slows. Organic service tree bud extract helps to stimulate the skins microcirculation and boosts radiance. This innovative day and night duo ensure the skins specific needs are met around the clock.

The Night Cream for All Skin Types boosts the skin’s radiance thanks to the service tree bud extract.



Suitable for

All skin types



How to use

Apply in the morning to clean, dry skin. Warm the cream in the hands then place them over the face, working from the middle outward over the face and neck. Apply by gently pressing into the skin, always from the middle of the face outwards to avoid pulling tissues, enhance drainage and preserve features’ youthful appearance.
ai_title: Clarins Super Restorative Night Cream - 50ml
ai_summary:
Restore your skin's youthful radiance with Clarins Super Restorative Night Cream, a luxurious formula designed to address the unique needs of menopausal skin.

  • Combats visible signs of ageing: Targets dryness, slackening, loss of density, wrinkles, and uneven skin tone.
  • Innovative formula: Features organic harungana, a powerful replenishing and anti-ageing ingredient.

title: Clarins Super Restorative Day Cream All Skin Types  50ml
description:
New innovation for menopausal skin.

The Super Restorative range is ideal for all women experiencing the effects of hormonal changes associated with menopause and has been formulated to support the skin during this stage of a woman's life. The skin is a hormone dependent organ and the changes in hormones during peri and the start of post-menopause result in the skin becoming unbalanced. This disruption means that the skin struggles to protect itself during the day as well as reactivate itself at night. This can result in signs of ageing becoming more visible. The nourishing and revitalising formulas of Super Restorative help to fight visible changes on the skin which include dryness, skin slackening, loss of density, deep-set wrinkles, and an uneven skin tone. 

New research has led to Clarins’ discovery of organic harungana which has intensive replenishment and anti-ageing benefits and offers the same effect as retinol whilst being tolerated by all skin types. Organic harungana is combined with our new plant discovery, organic gorse extract, which helps improve the tone of fibroblasts by up to 89% and provides a firmer, more toned skin alongside other ingredients such as organic desert date extract, organic sea lily and vitamin C derivative. 

Each of the Super Restorative Day & Night creams are formulated to adapt to the skin’s chronobiology. During the day, the skin is vulnerable and needs protection and the squalane extract found in our day formulas reinforces the hydrolipidic film and protects the skin. At night, the skin needs reactivating as microcirculation slows. Organic service tree bud extract helps to stimulate the skins microcirculation and boosts radiance. This innovative day and night duo ensure the skins specific needs are met around the clock.

The Day Cream for All Skin Types protects the skin from pollutants due to its anti-pollution complex, protects the skin’s natural barrier with vegetal squalene and instantly smooths the skin thanks to line filing pearls.



Suitable for

All skin types



How to use

Apply in the morning to clean, dry skin. Warm the cream in the hands then place them over the face, working from the middle outward over the face and neck. Apply by gently pressing into the skin, always from the middle of the face outwards to avoid pulling tissues, enhance drainage and preserve features’ youthful appearance.
ai_title: Clarins Super Restorative Day Cream - 50ml
ai_summary:
Rediscover youthful radiance with Clarins Super Restorative Day Cream, a luxurious formula designed to address the specific skincare needs of menopausal skin.

  • Targets visible signs of ageing: Reduces dryness, skin slackening, wrinkles, and uneven tone.
  • Innovative formula: Features organic harungana, offering retinol-like benefits without irritation, and organic gorse extract to improve skin firmness.
  • Daily protection: Includes an anti-pollution complex and squalane to protect and reinforce the skin's barrier.
  • Chronobiology-focused: Designed to adapt to the skin's daily rhythms, providing optimal support throughout the day.
  • Luxurious texture: Instantly smooths the skin with line-filling pearls for a radiant complexion.

title: Clinique Moisture Surge™ 100H Auto-Replenishing Hydrator 30ml
description:
Clinique Moisture Surge™ 100H Auto-Replenishing Hydrator 30ml

Refreshing oil-free gel-cream with hyaluronic acid and aloe bio-ferment deeply hydrates for skin that looks plump and glowing.​  

​What It Is​: An oil-free gel-cream moisturiser with hyaluronic acid and aloe bio-ferment that sinks into skin for deep, lasting hydration. ​

​99% of women said skin feels deeply hydrated.*​

*Consumer testing on 110 women after one week​  

​What It Does​: This lightweight oil-free formula provides deeply moisturising hydration.​

Advanced hydrator with Auto-Replenishing Technology that helps skin create its own internal water source to continually rehydrate itself, then locks in moisture for a plump, healthy-looking glow.​

Safe for sensitive skin.​

​High-Performance Results:​

99% of women said skin feels deeply hydrated.*​

95% of women said skin looks plump.*​

91% of women said skin looks glowing.*​

98% of women said skin feels more resilient.*​

95% of women said skin feels healthier.*​

*Consumer testing on 110 women after one week​  

​Key Ingredients:​ Hyaluronic Acid + Aloe Bioferment combines two hydrating ingredients into one powerhouse complex to help attract moisture and retain it.​

Hyaluronic Acid: This moisture-binding ingredient helps create a “moisture reservoir” for ideal hydration.​

Aloe Bioferment: The aloe vera plant undergoes an exclusive fermentation process that breaks apart larger molecules into smaller ones, making them more easily absorbed into skin. Activated aloe water, and responsibly sourced and certified organic aloe extract powder, helps skin retain moisture.​  

Good to know:​ Now in more sustainable packaging. 30ml, 50ml, and 75ml are packed in recyclable glass jars and uses PCR plastic lids.​

What is PCR? PCR stands for “Post-Consumer Recycled.” PCR plastic is recycled plastic and enables us to reduce the creation of new plastic waste.​

How to recycle: The glass jars are recyclable. Remove the cap, then rinse the jar and place in the relevant recycling bin.​



Suitable for

All skin types​



How to use

Use morning and night on clean skin ​ This favourite multi-tasker can also be used as a dewy highlighter, 5-minute mask and cuticle treatment.​



Important info

title: Clearblue Advanced Digital Ovulation Test Kit - 10 tests
description:
Clearblue Advanced Digital Ovulation Test Kit (OPK) 10 TestsClearblue Advanced Digital Ovulation Test is the only test to typically identify 4 or more fertile days (1) when you have the best chances to get pregnant naturally. By accurately tracking 2 key fertility hormones, estrogen and luteinising hormone, it identifies 2 peak fertility days, like all other ovulation tests, but also additional high fertility days before that. This means you have more opportunities to get pregnant - at least twice as many as with any other ovulation test*. Because your partner’s sperm can survive in your body for up to 5 days, you can actually become pregnant by having intercourse during the days leading up to ovulation. Have intercourse on high and peak fertility days to maximise your chances of getting pregnant naturally. The clear digital display gives you a Clearblue smiley face when it identifies your best days to get pregnant so you know your body is ready. Clearblue Digital tested over 99% accurate at detecting the LH surge. For more information on this product or answers to your questions, our Careline advisors are available for you 07:00 – 15:00 hrs Mon-Fri, excluding Bank Holidays. To make it easier for you to find the right product, please note that Clearblue Advanced Digital Ovulation Test in the past was also called Clearblue Digital Ovulation Test with Dual Hormone Indicator. (1)In a study of 87 women, 4 or more fertile days were identified in 80% of cycles using actual cycle length (2012)Product features

  • The only test to typically identify 4 or more fertile days – at least 2x any other ovulation test*
  • Accurately tracks your personal levels of 2 key fertility hormones
  • Identifies additional high fertility days that no other test can, so you have more opportunities to get pregnant
  • Clear results, the unique Clearblue ‘smiley face’ appears on your fertile days
  • Can adjust every time you test according to your unique hormone profile
  • Over 99% accurate at detecting the LH surge
  • Easy to use vs strips - in a UK study, 7/10 women found ‘strips’ were not ‘easy to use’ (111 women using and reading different test types)
  • Reusable reader and 10 Clearblue ovulation test sticks included



How to use

Read complete instructions before use. Before applying urine to the test stick it must be inserted into the test holder.



Hazards and Cautions

Clearblue Advanced Digital Ovulation Test is not intended for contraceptive use and is not suitable if you have recently been pregnant, reached the menopause, have polycystic ovarian syndrome or take certain fertility drugs. Please read the enclosed leaflet carefully. This device is for home use. Keep out of the reach of children. Store at room temperature. Do not reuse the test sticks. Clearblue is a trade mark of SPD Swiss Precision Diagnostics GmbH (‘SPD’). Copyright © 2017 SPD. All rights reserved.



Important info

Features and Benefits

  • Identifies extra High fertility days that no other test can, so you have more opportunities to get pregnant
  • The only ovulation test that accurately tracks your personal levels of 2 key fertility hormones
  • Clear results, the unique Clearblue ‘smiley face’ appears on your fertile days
  • Only digital ovulation test brand that adapts to suit your unique cycle every time you test
  • Reusable Holder
  • Over 99% accurate at detecting the LH surge
